column4: id actually like it if i could get this stuff to work for free
what 'stuff'  ? forums and google is our friends.
google cant fix my problems.. i asked A MILLION TIMES
and if no one knows.. then no one knows..

best thing to do wouldbe to write up a little web site/post/forum post with the details of the problem.. then every so often ask your question and refer people to the forum thread.  That way they can see all the details and see what others have suggested.
im not even clear on what your actual problem is any more.
just delete the parittion.. and remake it.. is one way
or format it.. if you want the contents  gond
is it typical that a FAT16 have a few kilos of stuff already on it when you create it?
i would not be suprised at that.
the way the fat table and stuff and other things take up space.. they never add up to how much you think they should be
is it possible to make an ext3 flash drive that m system can boot?
yes. you can have bootable ext2/3 usb thumbdrives with grub.
the ext3 uses more space by default... a whole 30 megs
thats because 5% is reserved for root and 'lost+found' - thats changeaable with tune2fs command
its not taking up any space. :) its reserved.
